summary: This header file defines platform-specific configurations and macros for Sendmail when running on OpenBSD. It specifies support for system features like shared memory, semaphores, and message queues.

logs.reason: This string is defined as SM_OS_NAME which will likely be used in logs elsewhere in the codebase to identify that the application is running on OpenBSD.
logs.resolution: This is an informational string used for platform identification, no resolution required.
